## Bio 🙋🏻‍♀️

Sita Lujintanon is an epidemiologist by training and an implementation researcher who works to improve equity in HIV care engagement in Thailand, where she is from, and globally. She has a growing interest in overcoming missing data in the real world for improved HIV cascade outcome assessment. During her free time, Sita enjoys windsurfing, scuba diving, and hanging out with her dog, Sam 🐶. She is also learning how to code efficiently and looking forward to learn how to create a function and loop in R.
